Package com.goldsprite.magicdungeon.ecs.component

Class RenderComponent

java.lang.Object
com.goldsprite.magicdungeon.ecs.EcsObject
com.goldsprite.magicdungeon.ecs.component.Component
com.goldsprite.magicdungeon.ecs.component.RenderComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
SkeletonComponent, SpriteComponent
public abstract class RenderComponent extends Component
渲染组件基类 所有需要参与世界渲染排序的组件都应继承此类
